thread.section_title: LOLA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LOLA | mylola.com
thread.title: Kyla Garrett Wagner
thread.title_full: LOLA reviewed by Kyla Garrett Wagner

author: Kyla Garrett Wagner
title: Kyla Garrett Wagner
text: I love LOLA! It is a struggle to find honest companies that make healthy products, but thankfully LOLA has made the struggle a little easier. Their 100% cotton tampons and pads are extremely effective and I love that they don't have any added chemicals. And they work even better than the tampons I originally used! LOLA for Life :)
